article_title: In Tennessee, Obama Sings Davy Crockett
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The president appears more willing to burst into song after some rave reviews for his rendition of Amazing Grace.

During a conversation about Obamacare in Tennessee, President Obama took a question from a man named Davy Crockett.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“You don’t have a beaver cap,” Obama said to the man as he asked about about pushing through his application for social security

“Y’all remember that TV show? Actually a lot of people are too young here,” he said before singing a few bars of the tune.
